item.title: Jade add a quote by Edith Södergran
item.description:
"Love
My soul was a light-blue gown, sky-coloured; I left it on a cliff by the sea and naked I came to you, resembling a woman. And like a woman I sat at your table and drank a toast with wine and breathed in the scent of several roses. You found me beautiful, resembling something you'd seen dreaming, I forgot everything, I forgot my childhood and my homeland, I knew only that your caresses held me captive. And, smiling, you took up a mirror and bade me look. I saw that my shoulders were made of dust and crumbled away, I saw that my beauty was sick and had no desire other than to - disappear. Oh, hold me close in your arms, so tightly that I need nothing." -- Edith Södergran

item.title: Jade add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "I cannot write any sort of story unless there is at least one character in it for whom I have physical desire." -- Tennessee Williams
